gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
Kadar človek
charges someone an amount of money
, nekomu pove, kolikšen znesek naj plača za tisto, kar mu je priskrbel ali prodal.

seg.quote: ‘How much do you charge?’—‘£6 a night.’
You can be sure he's going to charge you something for the service.

sense.def:
To charge goods or services to a person or organization
pomeni poskrbeti, da neka oseba ali organizacija dobi račun za določene izdelke ali usluge.

seg.quote: Please charge the bill to my account.

sense.def:
The charge for something
je cena, ki jo moramo za nekaj plačati.

seg.quote: No charge is made for repairs.

sense.def:
A charge
je uradna obtožba za zločin.

Kadar policisti
charge someone
, nekoga uradno obtožijo, da je zagrešil zločin.

seg.quote: He was arrested and charged with a variety of offences.

sense.def:
Če ima človek
charge of something or someone
, je odgovoren za neko stvar ali osebo.

seg.quote: She intended to take charge of the boy herself.

sense.def:
Če je človek
in charge of something or someone
, je za nekaj ali nekoga odgovoren.

seg.quote: You had left me in charge.

sense.def:
To charge towards someone or something
pomeni hitro se pomakniti proti nekomu ali nečemu in napasti.

To charge a battery
pomeni spustiti električni tok skozi baterijo, da bi postala močnejša.
